definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
the hammer and sickle (flag of USSR, symbolizing rural and proletarian labor)

pinyin: lian2 dao1 xi4 bao1 pin2 xue4

sentences.english: Hammer and sickle symbols of the industrial worker and the peasant are used as the emblem of the ussr .
sentences.chinese: 代表产业工人和农民的锤子镰刀图案用作前苏联国徽。

sentences.english: He was very busy, putting an edge on a scythe .
sentences.chinese: 他正忙着干活，在磨一把长柄大镰刀的刃儿。

sentences.english: Its scythe-like tail into the water, the fishing line to slide down quickly also.
sentences.chinese: 它那大镰刀似的尾巴入水中后，钓丝也飞快地滑下去。

sentences.english: The hammer and sickle was flying over the roof.
sentences.chinese: 镰刀斧头旗在屋顶上下空飘扬。

sentences.english: Pope's is a velvet lawn, shaven by the scythe, and levelled by the roller.
sentences.chinese: 蒲柏的稿纸是天鹅绒般的草坪，镰刀割过，碾辊压过。

sentences.english: The whisper of the scythe then.
I find this Scythe of the Celt to be quite a disturbing force.
sentences.chinese: 我发现凯尔特人的这把大镰刀相当是干扰的力量。

sentences.english: Then all the scythes began to work at once.
sentences.chinese: 这时，所有的镰刀立即开始割草。

sentences.english: The sickle-wielding assailants then fled the scene on a motorcycle.
sentences.chinese: 拿着镰刀的攻击者后来乘坐摩托车逃离现场。

sentences.english: Peace will not come until the swords are beaten into plowshares, and their spears into pruning hooks.
sentences.chinese: 把到打成犁头，把枪打成镰刀，世上才有和平。

sentences.english: But Kosice’s hammer-and-sickle past is never far away.
sentences.chinese: 但是，镰刀铁锤统治科希策的日子并没有走得太远。

sentences.english: Samsara moon, sickle, hammer about the struggle of the voyage.
sentences.chinese: 日月轮回，镰刀，铁锤讲述着斗争的航程。

sentences.english: Scythe born from the soul of Lothric.
sentences.chinese: 从洛斯里克的灵魂诞生出的镰刀。

sentences.english: Needless to say, the Reaper’s scything only grows more insistent thereafter.
sentences.chinese: 更不必说，死神的长柄大镰刀此后只会变得更加坚决。

sentences.english: Do you dare to have a try of haircut by sickle?
sentences.chinese: 有趣的镰刀理发，你敢不敢抢鲜尝试？

sentences.english: Stubble side was brushy , that resulted from blunt sickle's reaping.
sentences.chinese: 茬口毛茸茸的，一看就知道是钝口的镰刀收割的。
